suite.name: CreateCharacters

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/accounts/ path_url=/accounts/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '33', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "victorpvom@gmail.com"}'

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Factory Thanos
kw.msg: &{personagem} = { name=Kristen Smith | aliases=Thanos | age=3000 | team=Ordem Negra | active=False }

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters/ path_url=/characters/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61d4ce151eac8b001656b0ff', 'Content-Length': '99', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Kristen Smith", "aliases": "Thanos", "age": 3000, "team": "Ordem Negra", "active": false}'

suite.doc: Suite de teste do cadastro de personagens na API da Marvel
